title: Asbestos and hazmat inspection reports
dataVerified: Property owner, inspector name/license, property address, findings, abatement recommendations
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Inspection status (completed/cleared). Link to licensed inspector system (owner and buyers, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fabricated clean asbestos reports. Domain binding verifies licensed inspector. High liability risk. Long retention for building lifetime. Buyer/tenant protection.
